item.title: Running Brew on the New Apple M1 Chip
item.description: On the new Macbook M1 chip, you might get an error such as “To install under x86_64, install Homebrew into /usr/local” - which will take you down many rabbit holes. This is an actual solution that fully works. I used my GoogleFu and did not find a solution as simple as this: 5 Simple Steps to Install Intel Brew on M1 Install Rosetta (this will fail if your Terminal is set to “Open using Rosetta") by running softwareupdate --install-rose Run this command to install the Intel architecture Homebrew arch -x86_64 /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.
